name: Slobber
content:
Slobber was a male Growzer with black and brown skin that was owned by the Chiss Rancher Xodlak'phr'ooa "Lakproh" and resided on the Chiss Ascendancy planet Celwis. Lakproh's daughter, Lakris, trained Slobber to "telepathically" come with her when she pulled her coat's sealer down. She showed the trick to several of Lakrpoh's rancher neighbors, who were annoyed when they found out what the young girl's telepathy was. Around 18 BBY, after the Agbui telepathic species came to reside near Lakproh's ranch, the Agbui youngling Frosif saw how her friend, Lakris, performed the telepathic trick, which provoked her an unexpected post-traumatic episode of flat-blast artillery shells exploding on the planet Sunrise.
Slobber was mentioned in the 2021 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Greater Good, the second volume in Timothy Zahn's Ascendancy Trilogy.
